Package mono.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mono.controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a bridge between the view and the model. Handles the inputs received from the view and converts them into commands to the model.
    Author:
    ricar

      • getInstance

        public static GameController getInstance​()
        Returns a singleton instance of the game controller
        Returns:
        the singleton instance

      • doTurn

        public Pair doTurn​()
        Called when Roll Dice or Bot Turn buttons are pressed.
        Returns:
        a pair with the dice values

      • buyProperty

        public int buyProperty​()
        Called when Buy Property button is pressed
        Returns:
        0 if property was bought, or a negative value otherwise

      • buyHouse

        public int buyHouse​(BuyableSquare s1)
        Called when Buy House button is pressed
        Parameters:
        s1 - properties where the player wants to build the house
        Returns:
        0 if house is bought, or a negative value otherwise

      • buyHotel

        public int buyHotel​(BuyableSquare s1)
        Called when Buy Hotel button is pressed
        Parameters:
        s1 - properties where the player wants to build the hotel
        Returns:
        0 if hotel is bought, or a negative value otherwise

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String piece)
        Adds a player to the game
        Parameters:
        piece - board piece of the said player

        public void endTurn​()
        Called when End Turn or End Bot Turn buttons are pressed

      • payJail

        public void payJail​()
        Called when player wants to pay fine to get out of jail

      • tellViewToDisplayJailDialog

        public boolean tellViewToDisplayJailDialog​()
        Tells the view to display the jail dialog, to give player the choice between waiting or pay fine
        Returns:
        true if player is in jail, false otherwise

      • mortgageProperty

        public void mortgageProperty​(int currentCard)
        Called when Mortgage button is pressed
        Parameters:
        currentCard - square to be mortgaged

      • getPlayerByName

        public Player getPlayerByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Return player with specified name
        Parameters:
        name - name of player wanted
        Returns:
        the player if he is found, otherwise returns null

      • reBuyProperty

        public void reBuyProperty​(int currentCard)
        Called when Re Buy button is pressed. Re buys square that was mortgaged
        Parameters:
        currentCard - square to be re bought

      • buyPropertyFromOtherPlayer

        public int buyPropertyFromOtherPlayer​(Player seller,
                                      Player buyer,
                                      BuyableSquare square)
        Called when buy button from Negotiation screen is pressed
        Parameters:
        seller - Player selling square
        buyer - Player buying square
        square - square to be negotiated
        Returns:
        -1 if buyer doesn't have enough, otherwise returns 0

      • buyPropertyfromBot

        public int buyPropertyfromBot​(Player buyer,
                              Player seller,
                              BuyableSquare square)
        Called when buy button from Negotiation screen is pressed and seller is bot
        Parameters:
        seller - Player selling square
        buyer - Player buying square
        square - square to be negotiated
        Returns:
        -1 if buyer doesn't have enough, otherwise returns 0
